item.title: Software Engineer: Application Developer
item.description:
Responsibilities:

  • Develop and maintain a TMSP application to solve classic distributed systems problems like key-value storage, locking, leader-election, service discovery, etc (ie. a TMSP version of consul or etcd).

item.title: Software Engineer: Developer Tooling
item.description:
Responsibilities:

  • Improve and maintain the tendermint RPC system
  • Improve and maintain the various CLIs and example applications
  • Improve and maintain common libraries
  • Write demos for different tendermint apps and behaviour

item.title: Software Engineer: Networking and Consensus
item.description:
Responsibilities:

  • Improve the implementation of the core Tendermint consensus algorithm
  • Develop a compatible implementation in another programming language
